channel.title: [Pi] Clipping [Pi]
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm trying to add NPC clipping, so they can't just roam through walls, and attacked clipping, so that players or npc's can run through objects to get the their opponent. I have tried multiple tutorials on Rune-Server but all of them either, just plain don't work due to crappy coding, or crash my client because of something to do with NPCHandler process. But, if anybody can help me figure out how to add NPC Clipping and NPC/Player Attacking clipping, that'd be super helpful!

item.title: [Pi] Clipping [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

K, I’ll try that out, but I’m still open for help, if anyone has any to give!

Read full topic

item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

there’s a tutorial on here that should work for PI, its for clipped following but you can play around with it to make it work for combat and other things.

@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, I’m trying to add NPC clipping, so they can’t just roam through walls, and attacked clipping, so that players or npc’s can run through objects to get the their opponent. I have tried multiple tutorials on Rune-Server but all of them either, just plain don’t work due to crappy coding, or crash my client because of something to do with NPCHandler process. But, if anybody can help me figure out how to add NPC Clipping and NPC/Player Attacking clipping, that’d be super helpful!
